trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIndentifier>" name="<KeyIndentifier>" href=""></xref> element that references a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Assertion>" name="<saml:Assertion>" href=""></xref> element in a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIndentifier>" name="<KeyIndentifier>" href=""> </xref> elemento que referencia um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Assertion>" name="<saml:Assertion>" href=""> </xref> elemento numa mensagem SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified SAML assertion identifier.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> classe utilizando o identificador de asserção SAML especificado.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> property of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> to this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Transmita o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>para este construtor.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier
trans-unit.target: O identificador do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> que contém o identificador da chave

trans-unit.source: assertionId is .
trans-unit.target: assertionIdis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified SAML assertion identifier, nonce, and key length.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> classe com o identificador de asserção SAML especificado, o nonce e o comprimento de chave.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> property of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> to this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Transmita o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>para este construtor.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are ignored when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause> class is serialized into an outgoing SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: O `derivationNonce` e `derivationLength` parâmetros são ignorados quando o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause>classe está a ser serializada numa mensagem de saída SOAP.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> que contém o identificador da chave.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém o nonce que foi utilizado para criar uma chave derivada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave derivada.

trans-unit.source: assertionId is .
trans-unit.target: assertionIdis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador para o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> que contém o identificador da chave.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> is specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>especificado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> que contém o identificador da chave.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key identifier is the same as the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o identificador de chave especificado é o mesmo que a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: This Matches overload returns a value of `true` when either of the following is `true`: - The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A> property of the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter has the same value as the current instance's <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga de correspondências devolve um valor de `true` quando é um dos seguintes `true`: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A>propriedade o `keyIdentifierClause` parâmetro com o mesmo valor que a instância atual <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The `keyIdentifierClause` parameter and this instance are the same instance.
trans-unit.target: -O `keyIdentifierClause` parâmetro nesta instância, sendo a mesma instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to be compared.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified key identifier is the same as the current instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o identificador de chave especificado é o mesmo que a instância atual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified SAML assertion identifier is the same as the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o identificador de asserção SAML especificado é o mesmo que a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: The comparison is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A comparação é sensível a maiúsculas e minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The SAML assertion identifier to be compared.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de asserção SAML a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: when assertionId has the same value as the current instance's property; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Quando assertionId tem o mesmo valor que a instância actual propriedade; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that includes the SAML assertion identifier that represents the current key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>que inclui o identificador de asserção SAML que representa a cláusula do identificador da chave atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that includes the SAML assertion identifier that represents the current <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que inclui o identificador de asserção SAML que representa o atual <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.String>
